data.description: Random data generation for parsers or regexp
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module could ultimately be a testing companion for
    Parse::RecDescent. The random data that it generates (thus RandGen)
    will be primarily used for testing various parsers (thus Parse).

    The generation of data for regular expressions is actually a subset
    of generating data for parsers, otherwise I might have gone for
    Regexp::RandGen.
